DeviceId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI Subsystem Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.
DeviceId.description: The Device ID of this PCIe function.

SubsystemId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI Subsystem Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.
SubsystemId.description: The Subsystem ID of this PCIe function.

VendorId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.
VendorId.description: The Vendor ID of this PCIe function.

SubsystemVendorId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI Subsystem Vendor ID of the PCIe device function.
SubsystemVendorId.description: The Subsystem Vendor ID of this PCIe function.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PciId.longDescription: This type shall describe a PCI ID.

enumDescriptions.StorageInitiator: The entity is a storage initator. The EntityLink property (if present) should be a Storage.StorageController entity.
enumDescriptions.Processor: The entity is a processor device.
enumDescriptions.RootComplex: The entity is a PCI(e) root complex. The EntityLink property (if present) should be a ComputerSystem.ComputerSystem entity.
enumDescriptions.DisplayController: The entity is a display controller.
enumDescriptions.Drive: The entity is a disk drive. The EntityLink property (if present) should be a Drive.Drive entity.
enumDescriptions.NetworkController: The entity is a network controller. The EntityLink property (if present) should be an EthernetInterface.EthernetInterface entity.
enumDescriptions.Bridge: The entity is a PCI(e) bridge.
enumDescriptions.StorageExpander: The entity is a storage expander. The EntityLink property (if present) should be a Chassis.Chassis entity.

PciId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI ID of the endpoint.
PciId.description: The PCI ID of the endpoint.

Identifiers.longDescription: Identifiers for this endpoint shall be unique in the context of other endpoints that can reached over the connected network.

Redundancy.description: Redundancy information for the lower level endpoints supporting this endpoint.

HostReservationMemoryBytes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the amount of memory in Bytes that the Host should allocate to connect to this endpoint.
HostReservationMemoryBytes.description: The amount of memory in Bytes that the Host should allocate to connect to this endpoint.

EndpointProtocol.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the protocol this endpoint uses to communicate with other endpoints on this fabric.
EndpointProtocol.description: The protocol supported by this endpoint.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.
Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.
Actions.description: The Actions object contains the available custom actions on this resource.

Ports.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Port that are utilized by this endpoint.
Ports.description: An array of references to the the physical ports associated with this endpoint.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

MutuallyExclusiveEndpoints.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Endpoint that cannot be used in a zone if this endpoint is used in a zone.
MutuallyExclusiveEndpoints.description: An array of references to the endpoints that may not be used in zones if this endpoint is used in a zone.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Links.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.
Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

ConnectedEntities.longDescription: This value of this property shall contain all the entities which this endpoint allows access to.
ConnectedEntities.description: All the entities connected to this endpoint.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoint.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a fabric endpoint for a Redfish implementation.
Endpoint.description: This is the schema definition for the Endpoint resource. It represents the properties of an entity that sends or receives protocol defined messages over a transport.

EntityLink.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to an entity of the type specified by the description of the value of the EntityType property.
EntityLink.description: A link to the associated entity.

Identifiers.longDescription: Identifiers for the remote entity shall be unique in the context of other resources that can reached over the connected network.

PciFunctionNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI Function Number of the connected PCIe entity.
PciFunctionNumber.description: The PCI ID of the connected entity.

EntityPciId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI ID of the connected PCIe entity.
EntityPciId.description: The PCI ID of the connected entity.

PciClassCode.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the PCI Class Code, Subclass code, and Programming Interface code of the PCIe device function.
PciClassCode.description: The Class Code, Subclass code, and Programming Interface code of this PCIe function.

EntityType.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if type of connected entity.
EntityType.description: The type of the connected entity.

EntityRole.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if the specified entity is an initiator, target, or both.
EntityRole.description: The role of the connected entity.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ConnectedEntity.longDescription: This type shall represent a remote resource that is connected to a network accessible to an endpoint.
ConnectedEntity.description: Represents a remote resource that is connected to the network accessible to this endpoint.

enumDescriptions.Initiator: The entity is acting as an initiator.
enumDescriptions.Both: The entity is acting as both an initiator and a target.
enumDescriptions.Target: The entity is acting as a target.

title: #Endpoint.v1_0_2.Endpoint
